short_summary: Aircraft spare parts, 40 relays, delivery to 7 CFSD Edmonton, and another FCA Plant.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at the depots named by March 31, 2024. Item 1, GSIN: 5999, NSN: 5999-01-428-2267, Relay. Part No.: M6106/39-002, NCAGE: 81349 Quantity: 40, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, FCA Free Carrier. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. From FCA Plant to 7 CFSD Edmonton. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
full_summary:
**Aircraft Spare Parts**

### Request for Proposal Reference Number

* W8485-247991/B

### Brief Overview

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the supply of aircraft spare parts to meet specific requirements. Tenders must be submitted in one of Canada's official languages: English or French.

### Technical Requirements

 Goods and services are required to meet the following specifications:

* Item 1: Relay, NSN: 5999-01-428-2267, quantity: 40 units, unit of issue: each, to be delivered to the 7 Canadian Forces Support Group (CFSBG) in Edmonton by March 31, 2024.

### Bidder's Notice

To respond to this bid, bidders must submit tenders that meet the specified requirements. Those submitting equivalent or substitute products must provide the part number and NCAGE code for the goods or services being proposed.

### Trade Agreements

Since this is a domestic tender, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) will be applicable. In accordance with the CFTA, a preference will be given to bids from Canadian businesses.

### Selection Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Address and Contact Information

* Contracting Entity Name (Procurement Entity): Department of National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Drive
* City: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
* Postal Code: H1A0N2
* Contact Name: Jordan Racine
* Email Address: [jordan.racine@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jordan.racine@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone Number: (306) 690-5110

### Document Attachment

Please find the tender documentation attached to this notice.

* [Tender Notice Document in English (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29586/w8485-247991---rfp-eng.pdf)
* [Tender Notice Document in French (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29586/w8485-247991---rfp-fr.pdf)

### Important Dates

* Solicitation Number: W8485-247991/B
* Publication Date: January 17, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 7, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
* Expected Contract Commencement Date: February 7, 2024
